programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Knighty Knight Knight. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out it's inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Phan-Tom of the Oompah. In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleader's lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Ballad of the Catnip Kid. After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Mirror Image. Skullie tells Tom that he won't have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Gym Rat. Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be outdone, Tom starts lifting weights as well – which sets up an epic Battle Royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: It's All Relative. When Jerry's country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Sleep Disorder. Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom's In-Tents Adventure. Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite. Tom tries hard to get some relaxation but nature and all its inhabitants including bears get in his way.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer. Ozma wants to whip up a snack but has never baked before. Dorothy shows her how to make cookies. But Dorothy accidentally grabs the Potion of Life instead of the vanilla and pours it into the mixing bowl! The hand-mixer spins to life, magically mixing things together as it whizzes around the room. Oh my! The mixer spins out of the palace, mixing everything in its path! Realizing the only way to reverse the mix-up is to reverse the spell, Dorothy and Ozma must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo the Unlucky. Dorothy and the gang need to take a munchkin Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse! As soon as they start their journey, they find out how Ojo the Unlucky earned his name – when they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen! From having to cross the Deadly Desert to getting attacked by Orks, it's bad luck at every turn. When the Nome King catches them, he's determined to lock them up to keep the bad luck out of his kingdom. But Dorothy reframes their day, realizing it was actually Ojo's good luck that got them out of every obstacle.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rules of Attraction. It's Valentine's Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentine's present – a love magnet! However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and "acts" of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally. Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey who's run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozma's help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they don't seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wand-erful. There's a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glinda's protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witch's wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glinda's steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, it's up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else it's curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover. Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that she's been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Lion Catches a Bug. When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion – the King of the Forest – to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lion's ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lion's ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Farewell Sweet Ride. Bodhi processes the loss of her favorite snowboard.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Calorie Count. Jerry's high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he can't resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchess's visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Fortune Hunters. When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry aren't inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, they're disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dog's steps, they chase the fortune cookie's trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Game Changer. As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Kiss and Makeup. Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast who's just as surprised to encounter Tom. It's soon revealed to be Toodles, who's a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Suitable for Framing. A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out what's going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Springtime for Spike. When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friend's French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon he's practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyone's behavior be affected by Sabrina's presence?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks
programme.desc: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.sub-title: Attachment Disorder. Tom and Spike get glued together.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Gym Rat. Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be outdone, Tom starts lifting weights as well – which sets up an epic Battle Royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike Gets Skooled. Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Magical Mandolin. When Wicked Witch Wilhelmina (JESSICA DiCICCO) steals the Magical Mandolin ("Play it by day, it makes you dance; but play it at night, it puts you in a trance!"), Dorothy and her friends have to get it back…and fast! Or Wilhelmina will use the Mandolin to put Dorothy in a trance and steal her Ruby Slippers! Dorothy has to rely on her friends and the power of her Ruby Slippers to get it back or Wilhelmina will have her, and all of Oz, dancing to a new tune.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Official Ozian Exam. The Mayor tells Dorothy she must pass the Official Oziam Exam in order to stay in Oz. Scarecrow (MICHAEL GOUGH) tries to tutor her, but an emergency in Munchkinland takes her attention off the books and onto an adventure. She has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Is Dorothy is able to help and have time to study? How will she pass the test?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Locket Locket in My Pocket. The Munchkins are throwing a down-home, country fair in honor of Dorothy. While Dorothy enjoys the pleasures of the fair, Wilhelmina finds a magical locket that allows her to look exactly like whoever's picture she keeps in it (except for a green streak in her hair). Wilhelmina uses it to take the form of Dorothy and crash the fair. With the wicked Dorothy impersonator running about the fair, the Munchkins are appalled that Princess Dorothy is acting so greedy, grabby and ungrateful! The real Princess Dorothy must figure out what's going on and clear her name before the citizens of Oz revoke her Princess-ship.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rules of Attraction. It's Valentine's Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentine's present – a love magnet! However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and "acts" of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Brain Power of Love. The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrow's brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelmina's clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rise of the Nome King. After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once he's big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks
programme.desc: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: The Giggles. Arlo misunderstands a lesson about laughing at others.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Puppy Love. Avocado's friends take her on her daily walkies.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Plant Food. At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as it's sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Whack a Gopher. Ginger and Rick's vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Hula Whoops. Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles' cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but it's no vacation. The cousin's missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Game of Bones. After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spike's lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because it's bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Bull Fight. Tom and Jerry take a case from a mother tortoise to find out where her son Seymour is sneaking off to at night. They discover Seymour is self-training to win a championship boxing match, planning to pay off bills with the prize money so his mom can quit the car wash. When he offers Tom and Jerry a cut of the money to keep his secret, they take it and agree to train him—but it won't be easy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: No Contest. After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isn't hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Jumping Pal. Lucas encounters a peculiar creature - A Jumping Bean.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: North Meets West. With the Wicked Witch becoming more of a threat, Dorothy, Glinda, and the gang go to Tattypoo, the retired Good Witch of the North to see if she'll come out of retirement to help them fight against the Wicked Witch of the West and her silver slippers. Just as Tattypoo is about to agree, the Wicked Witch strikes and erases her memory, putting her out of commission. The Wicked Witch has a plan to trick the amnesiac Tattypoo into believing that she was an evil witch just like her before she lost her memory. It's up to Dorothy and friends to retrieve enough mementos from Tattypoo's past to help her remember who she really was.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Battle for the Silver Slippers Part 1. With the Wicked Witch run amok with power, Dorothy decides that enough is enough and she's got to find a way to stop the silver slippers. She and her friends travel back to the Silver Fortress to see if it can provide any clues to the slippers' power. But the Wicked Witch knows what they're up to and is watching they're every move. When they find a mysterious door inside the fortress, the Witch traps them and opens it herself. From the other side of the door walks out someone they would never expect, the Wicked Witch of the East!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Battle for the Silver Slippers Part 2. Dorothy and the gang retreat back to Oz to inform everyone what's happened: the Wicked Witch of the East is back! When the two Wicked Witches show up in Emerald City and come after Dorothy for her ruby red slippers, everyone else is forced to retreat while Dorothy protects the slippers by herself alone in Emerald City. If the Wicked Witch of the East gets her hands on them, she'll be back for good! Glinda helps the gang recruit all their friends and the people Dorothy has helped to come to her aid and take on the two Wicked Witches as a united Ozian front. Just for long enough to get those silver slippers off the Wicked Witch of the West's feet so East gets sent back to the other side!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rules of Attraction. It's Valentine's Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentine's present – a love magnet! However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and "acts" of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Locket Locket in My Pocket. The Munchkins are throwing a down-home, country fair in honor of Dorothy. While Dorothy enjoys the pleasures of the fair, Wilhelmina finds a magical locket that allows her to look exactly like whoever's picture she keeps in it (except for a green streak in her hair). Wilhelmina uses it to take the form of Dorothy and crash the fair. With the wicked Dorothy impersonator running about the fair, the Munchkins are appalled that Princess Dorothy is acting so greedy, grabby and ungrateful! The real Princess Dorothy must figure out what's going on and clear her name before the citizens of Oz revoke her Princess-ship.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer. Ozma wants to whip up a snack but has never baked before. Dorothy shows her how to make cookies. But Dorothy accidentally grabs the Potion of Life instead of the vanilla and pours it into the mixing bowl! The hand-mixer spins to life, magically mixing things together as it whizzes around the room. Oh my! The mixer spins out of the palace, mixing everything in its path! Realizing the only way to reverse the mix-up is to reverse the spell, Dorothy and Ozma must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo the Unlucky. Dorothy and the gang need to take a munchkin Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse! As soon as they start their journey, they find out how Ojo the Unlucky earned his name – when they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen! From having to cross the Deadly Desert to getting attacked by Orks, it's bad luck at every turn. When the Nome King catches them, he's determined to lock them up to keep the bad luck out of his kingdom. But Dorothy reframes their day, realizing it was actually Ojo's good luck that got them out of every obstacle.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Findley is Sick. Findley fibs about being sick to avoid chores. Dr. Lucas isn't happy.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Saddle Soreheads. Bedfordshire Bertie, a champion show horse, runs away and hides on the estate grounds, where Jerry does his best to help her hide from nosey Tom. Bertie is stressed out over a big upcoming meet, but Jerry has a calming effect on her. When Tom catches up with them, he, too, helps the horse overcome her nerves and get back to her old self.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Rosemary's Gravy. Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Ginger's mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Eggs on a Train. Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but won't pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Truffle Trouble. While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estate's new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock. Ginger places her granny's old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Junkyard Pup. When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump, Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before Ace and Rocco – the junkyard guard dogs – turn him into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Tongue Twister. When Bodhi’s tongue gets hurt, it’s up to Dr. Lucas to help.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: The Good the Wicked and the Silver Part 2. The Wicked Witch has taken the silver slippers and now the entire Silver Fortress and its silver army is under her command! Dorothy and her friends escape the fortress and go back to Oz to try to warn everyone, but the Wicked Witch is right behind them, riding on the back of the Quox. The Witch tells them that Dorothy must surrender the ruby slippers to her before the silver army gets there and marches on Emerald City. But Dorothy and friends refuse to go down without a fight. And they have some volunteers to help: Baron Fernando Von Soozle, the infamous Witch Hunter, is back. But this time he's brought an entire League of Witch Hunters to help them take on the Wicked Witch. Will it be enough? Well, it'll have to do for right now.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Just for Kicks. The Wicked Witch decides she needs an army to replace the one that she lost and sets her sights on the all-female all-dancing army of General Jinjur. She lures the overworked and over-danced army of Jinjur away from her and has plans to turn their kicks destructive. Jinjur goes to Dorothy for help. They team up to create a new army to get the Witch's one away from her, but the only people they're able to recruit are Woozy and his friends. They're going to have to whip Woozy and the other animals into shape if they stand a chance of defeating the Witch's karate-kicking army.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Magical Mandolin. When Wicked Witch Wilhelmina (JESSICA DiCICCO) steals the Magical Mandolin ("Play it by day, it makes you dance; but play it at night, it puts you in a trance!"), Dorothy and her friends have to get it back…and fast! Or Wilhelmina will use the Mandolin to put Dorothy in a trance and steal her Ruby Slippers! Dorothy has to rely on her friends and the power of her Ruby Slippers to get it back or Wilhelmina will have her, and all of Oz, dancing to a new tune.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Official Ozian Exam. The Mayor tells Dorothy she must pass the Official Oziam Exam in order to stay in Oz. Scarecrow (MICHAEL GOUGH) tries to tutor her, but an emergency in Munchkinland takes her attention off the books and onto an adventure. She has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Is Dorothy is able to help and have time to study? How will she pass the test?

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXV
programme.desc: Sandy’s Sandy Shipment. When Sandy learns about a massive shipment of sand that needs to be delivered, she is determined to help. But her size means she can't help Thomas tow the sand, so she finds other ways to help him. Along the way, Sandy accidentally gets Thomas' sand shipment wet, turning it to mud, and making it impossible to get over a mountain without spilling anything. However, Sandy is still determined to help Thomas complete his sandy delivery.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXV
programme.desc: A Wide Delivery. Carly needs all the trains to help with a very big delivery - relocating three cottages to the other side of Sodor! They must work in pairs to deliver one cottage each. When Thomas gets paired with Diesel, he's sad he doesn't get to work with his best friend Percy, who is delivering another cottage with Nia. Can Thomas and Diesel complete their delivery or will Thomas be too distracted without his best friend?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.
